meanings.sent1: She was ineligible to join the club because she didn't meet the requirements.
meanings.sent2: The student was ineligible for the scholarship due to his low grades.
meanings.sent3: It was quite funny when he tried to enter the contest even though he was ineligible.
meanings.sent4: Her lack of experience made her ineligible for the advanced position.
meanings.sent5: The athlete's injury rendered him ineligible to compete in the upcoming tournament.

meanings.definition: Not qualified or entitled to participate
meanings.sent1: He felt ineligible to run for class president as he was new to the school.
meanings.sent2: The employee was ineligible for the promotion because he didn't have the required certification.
meanings.sent3: It seemed absurd that the cat thought it was ineligible to attend the dog's birthday party.
meanings.sent4: The old car was ineligible for the race due to its outdated engine.
meanings.sent5: The young child was ineligible to ride the roller coaster because of his height.
